p: The results of present study confirmed the allelopathic activity of sage and thymus essential oils and the ability to inhibit the germination of investigated weed species. The synergism of these oils induced the increasing of bio-herbicidal effect revealed at lower concentrations. The mixtures of oils could be recommended for Amaranthus retroflexus, Chenopodium album, and Echinochloa crus-galli control in wheat fields.
